CustomField.description: This field will return Payment Type if it matches the criteria for B360, Prorated amount and BAD is not blank.
CustomField.formula: SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Billing_360_Transaction__c && NOT(ISBLANK(Next_Recurring_Bill_Date__c)) && Of_LIC_Products__c > 0 && Quote_ACV__c>0 && ( ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Annual") || ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Semi-Annual") || ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Quarterly") || ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Monthly") )
CustomField.label: B360 Proration Identifier
